statements: DELETE FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age > 30 AND Diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
DELETE FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Patient_ID = 100 AND Diagnosis = 'Cancer';
DELETE FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age > 50 AND Outcome = 'Improving';

DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE physician_id = 5 AND appointment_date = '2022-03-15';
